b-autocomplete/check-infinite-scroll.description: Makes the component check if list reached scroll end and emit infinite-scroll event.

b-autocomplete/clearable.description: Add a button to clear the inputed text

b-autocomplete/custom-formatter.description: Function to format an option to a string for display in the input as alternative to field prop)

b-autocomplete/expanded.description: Makes input full width when inside a grouped or addon field

b-autocomplete/field.description: Property of the object (if data is array of objects) to use as display text, and to keep track of selected option

b-autocomplete/icon-right.description: Icon name to show on the right

b-autocomplete/keep-first.description: The first option will always be pre-selected (easier to just hit enter or tab)

b-autocomplete/loading.description: Add the loading state to the input

b-autocomplete/maxlength.description: Same as native maxlength, plus character counter

b-button/icon-left.description: Icon name to show on the left

b-button/icon-right.description: Icon name to show on the right

b-button/loading.description: Add the loading state to the button

b-carousel-list/arrow.description: Display the "next" or "prev" action when first or last item

b-carousel-list/arrow-hover.description: Display Arrow action when hover, but hidden on mobile

b-carousel-list/as-indicator.description: Switch mode to indicator for carousel

b-carousel-list/config.description: An object to pass all configs

b-carousel-list/has-drag.description: Toggle touch dragging, when touch not detected. auto switch mouse dragging

b-carousel-list/has-grayscale.description: Give a effect grayscale on img

b-carousel-list/has-opacity.description: Give a effect opacity on img

b-carousel-list/icon-next.description: Icon to use for next arrow

b-carousel-list/icon-prev.description: Icon to use for previous arrow

b-carousel-list/items-to-list.description: count of items to list when use navigation buttons

b-carousel-list/items-to-show.description: count of items to showed per view (support a decimal).

b-carousel-list/repeat.description: Back to value 0 when item active same with total data

b-carousel/arrow-both.description: Display the "next" and "prev" action when first or last item

b-carousel/arrow-hover.description: Display the "next" and "prev" action when hover, but hidden on mobile

b-carousel/has-drag.description: Toggle touch dragging, when touch not detected. auto switch mouse dragging

b-carousel/icon-next.description: Icon to use for next arrow

b-carousel/icon-prev.description: Icon to use for previous arrow

b-carousel/indicator.description: Display the indicator for jumping to specific item

b-carousel/indicator-custom.description: use when the image is more than 6 so that the indicator is not too small

b-carousel/indicator-custom-size.description: image size on the indicator when the indicator-custom is used

b-carousel/indicator-inside.description: Display the indicator inside on carousel

b-carousel/interval.description: Interval of the autoplay, in milliseconds

b-carousel/pause-hover.description: Pause carousel when autoplay and mouse enter

b-carousel/pause-info.description: Show infomation pause when autoplay and pause-hover

b-carousel/progress.description: Display the progress item of carousel

b-carousel/repeat.description: Controls whether the carousel loops around at the start and end.

b-carousel/with-carousel-list.description: use this when indicator custom with b-carousel-list

b-checkbox/false-value.description: Overrides the returned value when it's not checked

b-checkbox/true-value.description: Overrides the returned value when it's checked

b-clockpicker/auto-switch.description: Automatically switches between hour and minutes selection after click

b-clockpicker/disabled.description: Disables the input field and/or picker

b-clockpicker/editable.description: Enable input/typing. Note that you might have to set a custom time parser

b-clockpicker/hour-format.description: Hour format for input and display

b-clockpicker/hours-label.description: Label to show on hour button

b-clockpicker/inline.description: Clockpicker is shown inline, input is removed

b-clockpicker/loading.description: Add the loading state to the input

b-clockpicker/minutes-label.description: Label to show on minutes button

b-clockpicker/position.description: Optional, position of the timepicker relative to the input

b-clockpicker/time-formatter.description: Function to format time (Date type) to a string for display in the input

b-clockpicker/time-parser.description: Function to parse string to a time (Date type) for set a time from the input to the component

b-clockpicker/type.description: Type (color) of the button when checked

b-collapse/aria-id.description: Id for the container div. Should be used with aria-controls on trigger for better accessibility.

b-collapse/open.description: Whether collapse is open or not, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-datepicker/aria-next-label.description: Accessibility label for the next month button.

b-datepicker/aria-previous-label.description: Accessibility label for the previous month button.

b-datepicker/date-creator.description: Function used internally to create a new Date instance

b-datepicker/date-formatter.description: Function to format date to a string for display in the input

b-datepicker/date-parser.description: Function to parse string to a date for set a date from the input to the component

b-datepicker/day-names.description: Names of days to display in table header

b-datepicker/editable.description: Enable input/typing. Note that you might have to set a custom date parser

b-datepicker/first-day-of-week.description: First day of week to display in table header

b-datepicker/focused-date.description: Date that should be initially focused upon

b-datepicker/icon-next.description: Icon to use for next month

b-datepicker/icon-prev.description: Icon to use for previous month

b-datepicker/indicators.description: Shape to use when showing event indicators

b-datepicker/inline.description: Datepicker is shown inline, input is removed

b-datepicker/loading.description: Add the loading state to the input

b-datepicker/month-names.description: Names of months to display in table header

b-datepicker/multiple.description: Flag to allow choosing multiple dates

b-datepicker/nearby-month-days.description: Show/Hide nearby month days (prev and next month)

b-datepicker/nearby-selectable-month-day.description: When nearby-month-days, it allows to select/unselect nearby month days

b-datepicker/position.description: Optional, position of the datepicker relative to the input

b-datepicker/range.description: Flag to allow choosing a range of date

b-datepicker/rules-for-first-week.description: Choose the rule to determinate the first week of Year, 4 for ISO or 1 for other

b-datepicker/size.description: Vertical size of input and picker, optional

b-datepicker/unselectable-days-of-week.description: Array of unselectable days of week

b-datepicker/years-range.description: Years range relative to selected year

b-datetimepicker/datetime-formatter.description: Function to format datetime (Date type) to a string for display in the input

b-datetimepicker/datetime-parser.description: Function to parse string to a datetime (Date type) for set a datetime from the input to the component

b-datetimepicker/editable.description: Enable input/typing. Note that you might have to set a custom time parser

b-datetimepicker/horizontal-time-picker.description: Changes the time picker layout to a horizontal position

b-datetimepicker/inline.description: Datimepicker is shown inline, input is removed

b-datetimepicker/loading.description: Add the loading state to the input

b-datetimepicker/position.description: Optional, position of the timepicker relative to the input

b-datetimepicker/size.description: Vertical size of input and picker, optional

b-dropdown-item/aria-role.description: Role attribute to be passed to list item for better accessibility. Use menuitem only in situations where your dropdown is related to navigation menus.

b-dropdown-item/custom.description: Item is not a clickable item

b-dropdown-item/has-link.description: Use it if your item is an anchor tag or router-link

b-dropdown-item/separator.description: Set the item to be a separator

b-dropdown-item/value.description: The value that will be returned on events and v-model

b-dropdown/aria-role.description: Role attribute to be passed to list container for better accessibility. Use menu only in situations where your dropdown is related to navigation menus.

b-dropdown/can-close.description: Can close dropdown by pressing escape or by clicking outside

b-dropdown/close-on-click.description: Close dropdown when content is clicked

b-dropdown/hoverable.description: Dropdown will be triggered by hover instead of click

b-dropdown/inline.description: Dropdown content (items) are shown inline, trigger is removed

b-dropdown/mobile-modal.description: Dropdown content (items) are shown into a modal on mobile

b-dropdown/position.description: Optional, position of the dropdown relative to the trigger

b-field/custom-class.description: CSS classes to be applied on field label

b-field/group-multiline.description: Allow controls to fill up multiple lines, making it responsive

b-field/grouped.description: Direct child components/elements of Field will be grouped horizontally (see which ones at the top of the page)

b-field/horizontal.description: Group label and control on the same line for horizontal forms

b-field/label-for.description: Same as native for set on the label

b-field/position.description: Which position should the addons appear, optional

b-field/type.description: Type (color) of the field and help message, also adds a matching icon, optional. Used by Input, Select and Autocomplete

b-icon/custom-class.description: Add class to icon font, optional

b-input/custom-class.description: CSS classes to be applied on input

b-input/expanded.description: Makes input full width when inside a grouped or addon field

b-input/has-counter.description: Show character counter when maxlength prop is passed

b-input/icon-right.description: Icon name to be added on the right side

b-input/loading.description: Add the loading state to the input

b-input/maxlength.description: Same as native maxlength, plus character counter

b-input/validation-message.description: The message which is shown when a validation error occurs

b-loading/active.description: Whether modal is active or not, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-loading/can-cancel.description: Can close Loading by pressing escape or clicking outside

b-loading/is-full-page.description: Loader will overlay the full page

b-loading/on-cancel.description: Callback function to call after user canceled (pressed escape / clicked outside)

b-menu-item/active.description: Item is active, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-menu-item/aria-role.description: Role attribute to be passed to list item for better accessibility. Use menuitem only in situations where your menu item is really related to navigation.

b-menu-item/expanded.description: Item is expanded when default contains menu items, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-menu-list/aria-role.description: Role attribute to be passed to list container for better accessibility. Use menu only in situations where your dropdown is really related to navigation.

b-menu/accordion.description: Close automatically the previous selected menu list

b-menu/activable.description: Active automatically the clicked menu item

b-message/active.description: Whether notification is active or not, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-message/aria-close-label.description: Label for the close button, to be read by accessibility screenreaders.

b-message/closable.description: Adds an 'X' button that closes the notification — works if has a title

b-message/has-icon.description: Adds an icon on the left side depending on the type

b-message/icon.description: Icon name to use with has-icon

b-modal/active.description: Whether modal is active or not, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-modal/aria-role.description: Role attribute to be passed to modal container for better accessibility.

b-modal/can-cancel.description: Can close Modal by clicking 'X', pressing escape or clicking outside

b-modal/component.description: Component to be injected, used to open a component modal programmatically. Close modal within the component by emitting a 'close' event — this.$emit('close')

b-modal/custom-class.description: CSS classes to be applied on modal

b-modal/events.description: Events to be binded to the injected component

b-modal/has-modal-card.description: If your modal content has a .modal-card as root, add this prop or the card might break on mobile

b-modal/on-cancel.description: Callback function to call after user canceled (clicked 'X' / pressed escape / clicked outside)

b-modal/parent.description: Parent component of the modal, required if using component

b-modal/props.description: Props to be binded to the injected component

b-modal/scroll.description: clip to remove the <body> scrollbar, keep to have a non scrollable scrollbar to avoid shifting background, but will set <body> to position fixed, might break some layouts

b-navbar-dropdown/boxed.description: Show a boxed version of the dropdown

b-navbar-dropdown/hoverable.description: Dropdown will be triggered by hover instead of click

b-navbar-dropdown/right.description: Dropdown will be anchored to the right side

b-navbar-item/tag.description: Sets the type of the component that have to render as navbar-item

b-navbar/close-on-click.description: Control the behavior of the mobile menu by clicking on a link or outside the menu

b-navbar/fixed-bottom.description: Fixes the navbar to the bottom of the page

b-navbar/fixed-top.description: Fixes the navbar to the top of the page

b-navbar/is-active.description: To control the behaviour of the mobile menu programmatically, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-navbar/mobile-burger.description: Use to display or not the burger on mobile resolution.

b-navbar/spaced.description: Sets Top and Bottom paddings with 1rem, Left and Right paddings with 2rem

b-navbar/transparent.description: Remove any hover or active background from the navbar items

b-navbar/wrapper-class.description: To wrap the navbar content into an div with the provided class

b-notification/active.description: Whether notification is active or not, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-notification/aria-close-label.description: Label for the close button, to be read by accessibility screenreaders.

b-notification/auto-close.description: Hide notification after duration only not programmatic

b-notification/closable.description: Adds an 'X' button that closes the notification

b-notification/container.description: DOM element the toast will be created on. Note that this also changes the position of the toast from fixed to absolute. Meaning that the container should be fixed.

b-notification/has-icon.description: Adds an icon on the left side depending on the type

b-notification/icon.description: Icon name to use with has-icon

b-notification/indefinite.description: Show the Notification indefinitely until it is dismissed when programmatically

b-notification/position.description: Which position the notification will appear when programmatically

b-notification/queue.description: If should queue with others notices (snackbar/toast/notification)

b-numberinput/expanded.description: Makes input full width when inside a grouped or addon field

b-numberinput/loading.description: Add the loading state to the input

b-pagination-button/page.description: The prop page need to be passed upon the component (:page="props.page").

b-pagination/aria-current-label.description: Accessibility label for the current page link. If passed, this text will be prepended to the current page.

b-pagination/aria-next-label.description: Accessibility label for the next page link.

b-pagination/aria-page-label.description: Accessibility label for the page link. If passed, this text will be prepended to the number of the page.

b-pagination/aria-previous-label.description: Accessibility label for the previous page link.

b-pagination/current.description: Current page number, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-pagination/icon-next.description: Icon to use for next button

b-pagination/icon-prev.description: Icon to use for previous button

b-pagination/range-after.description: Items to paginatation items to show after current page

b-pagination/range-before.description: Number of pagination items to show before current page

b-progress/format.description: Which format should be used to display the value (if show-value is true). The value will be displayed as-is if using raw. The percent using value and max will be calculated and displayed if using percent

b-progress/keep-trailing-zeroes.description: Truncate or not the trailing zeroes

b-progress/max.description: The maximum value for the progress bar.

b-progress/precision.description: How many decimals should be displayed.

b-progress/show-value.description: If the value should be displayed inside the progress bar.

b-progress/size.description: Size of the progress bar, optional

b-progress/type.description: Type (color) of the progress bar, optional

b-progress/value.description: The progress value, progress will be indeterminate if undefined.

b-radio-button/type.description: Type (color) of the button when checked

b-rate/custom-text.description: Display custom text like a total points or total reviews, and this only for show-score

b-rate/disabled.description: Read only, if true Support decimal value

b-rate/rtl.description: Change text direction show-text, show-score and custom-text to left

b-rate/show-text.description: Display texts template. show-score and show-text cannot be true at the same time

b-rate/size.description: Include show-text, show-score and custom-text, optional

b-rate/texts.description: Texts template only for show-text, like on e-commerce

b-select/loading.description: Add the loading state to the Select

b-sidebar/can-cancel.description: Can close Modal by clicking 'X', pressing escape or clicking outside

b-sidebar/container.description: DOM element the sidebar will be created on when fixed

b-sidebar/expand-on-hover.description: Expand sidebar on hover when reduced or mobile is reduce

b-sidebar/on-cancel.description: Callback function to call after user canceled (clicked 'X' / pressed escape / clicked outside)

b-sidebar/open.description: To control the behaviour of the sidebar programmatically, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-sidebar/overlay.description: Show an overlay when sidebar is open

b-slider/custom-formatter.description: Function to format the tooltip label for display

b-slider/tooltip.description: Show tooltip when thumb is being dragged

b-slider/tooltip-type.description: The type (color) of the tootip. Defaults to type

b-step-item/clickable.description: Item can be used directly to navigate. If undefined, previous steps are clickable while the others are not.

b-step-item/step.description: Step marker content (when there is no icon)

b-step-item/type.description: Default Type/Style for the step, optional This will override parent type. Could be used to set a completed step to is-success for example

b-steps/aria-current-label.description: Accessibility label for the current page link. If passed, this text will be prepended to the current page.

b-steps/aria-page-label.description: Accessibility label for the page link. If passed, this text will be prepended to the number of the page.

b-steps/has-navigation.description: Next and previous buttons below the component. You can use this property if you want to use your own custom navigation items.

b-steps/icon-next.description: Icon to use for navigation button

b-steps/icon-pack.description: Icon pack to use for the navigation

b-steps/icon-prev.description: Icon to use for navigation button

b-steps/type.description: Default Type/Style for the steps, optional

b-switch/false-value.description: Overrides the returned value when it's not checked

b-switch/true-value.description: Overrides the returned value when it's checked

b-table-column/cell-class.description: CSS classes to be applied on cell

b-table-column/centered.description: Align the cell content to the center

b-table-column/custom-key.description: Unique identifier, use when label is missing or there are duplicate label names

b-table-column/custom-sort.description: Custom sort method, works when is sortable

b-table-column/field.description: Property of the object the column is attributed, used for sorting

b-table-column/header-class.description: CSS classes to be applied on header

b-table-column/header-selectable.description: Prevent text selection of header when setting this to false.

b-table-column/label.description: Column header text, also used to identify column if custom-key prop is missing

b-table-column/meta.description: Meta prop to add anything, useful when creating custom headers

b-table-column/numeric.description: Align the cell content to the right, sort icon on left

b-table-column/searchable.description: Add a input below the header to filter data

b-table-column/sortable.description: Whether the column can be sorted

b-table/aria-current-label.description: Accessibility label for the current page link. If passed, this text will be prepended to the current page (if paginated)

b-table/aria-next-label.description: Accessibility label for the next page link (if paginated)

b-table/aria-page-label.description: Accessibility label for the page link. If passed, this text will be prepended to the number of the page (if paginated)

b-table/aria-previous-label.description: Accessibility label for the previous page link (if paginated)

b-table/backend-filtering.description: Columns won't be filtered with Javascript, use with searchable prop to the columns to filter in your backend

b-table/backend-pagination.description: Rows won't be paginated with Javascript, use with page-change event to paginate in your backend

b-table/backend-sorting.description: Columns won't be sorted with Javascript, use with sort event to sort in your backend

b-table/checkable.description: Rows can be checked (multiple), checked rows will have a .is-checked class if you want to style

b-table/checkbox-position.description: Position of the checkbox (if checkable is true)

b-table/checked-rows.description: Set which rows are checked, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-table/columns.description: Table columns, you can also add renderHtml: true on each column object

b-table/current-page.description: Current page of table data (if paginated), use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-table/custom-is-checked.description: Custom method to verify if row is checked, works when is checkable. Useful for backend pagination

b-table/custom-row-key.description: Use a unique key of your data Object for each row. Useful if your data prop has dynamic indices. (id recommended)

b-table/default-sort.description: Sets the default sort column and order — e.g. ['first_name', 'desc']

b-table/default-sort-direction.description: Sets the default sort column direction on the first click

b-table/detail-key.description: Use an unique key of your data Object when use detailed or opened detailed. (id recommended)

b-table/detailed.description: Allow row details (check scoped slots documentation)

b-table/filters-event.description: Add a native event to filter

b-table/focusable.description: Table can be focused and user can navigate with keyboard arrows (require selected.sync) and rows are highlighted when hovering

b-table/has-detailed-visible.description: Controls the visibility of the trigger that toggles the detailed rows.

b-table/header-checkable.description: Show check/uncheck all checkbox in table header when checkable

b-table/is-row-checkable.description: Custom method to verify if a row is disabled, works when is checkable.

b-table/mobile-cards.description: Rows appears as cards on mobile (collapse rows)

b-table/opened-detailed.description: Allow pre-defined opened details. Ideal to open details via vue-router. (An unique key is required; check detail-key prop)

b-table/per-page.description: How many rows per page (if paginated)

b-table/row-class.description: Add a class to row (<tr> element) based on the return

b-table/scrollable.description: Add a horizontal scrollbar when table is too wide

b-table/selected.description: Set which row is selected, use the .sync modifier to make it two-way binding

b-table/show-detail-icon.description: Allow chevron icon and column to be visible

b-table/sort-icon-size.description: Sets the size of the sorting icon

b-table/sort-multiple-key.description: Adds a key which will be required for multi column sorting to work. Will always be enabled if null is selected (default). Requires sort-multiple

b-table/total.description: Total number of table data if backend-pagination is enabled

b-tabs/vertical.description: Display the tabs vertically. The content will be placed at right.

b-tag/aria-close-label.description: Accessibility label for the close button

b-tag/attached.description: Close/delete button style equal to attached tags

b-tag/closable.description: Add close/delete button to the tag

b-tag/ellipsis.description: Adds ellipsis to not overflow the text

b-tag/tabstop.description: If should stop when using tab key

b-taginput/allow-duplicates.description: Allows adding the same tag multiple times

b-taginput/allow-new.description: When autocomplete, it allow to add new tags

b-taginput/attached.description: Makes the tags attached instead of having an appended delete button, optional

b-taginput/autocomplete.description: Add autocomplete feature (if true, any Autocomplete props may be used too)

b-taginput/before-adding.description: Function to validate the value of the tag before adding

b-taginput/check-infinite-scroll.description: Makes the autocomplete component check if list reached scroll end and emit infinite-scroll event.

b-taginput/closable.description: Add close/delete button to the tag

b-taginput/confirm-key-codes.description: Array of key codes which will add a tag when typing (default comma, enter and tab)

b-taginput/ellipsis.description: Adds ellipsis on tags to not overflow the text

b-taginput/expanded.description: Makes input full width when inside a grouped or addon field (Autocomplete)

b-taginput/field.description: Property of the object (if data is array of objects) to use as display text

b-taginput/has-counter.description: Show counter when maxlength or maxtags props are passed

b-taginput/keep-first.description: The first option will always be pre-selected (easier to just hit enter or tab) (Autocomplete)

b-taginput/loading.description: Add the loading state to the input (Autocomplete)

b-taginput/maxlength.description: Limits the length of each tag, plus character counter

b-taginput/maxtags.description: Limits the number of tags, plus tag counter

b-taginput/on-paste-separators.description: Array of chars used to split when pasting a new string

b-taginput/remove-on-keys.description: Allow removing last tag when pressing given keys, if input is empty

b-timepicker/default-seconds.description: Default value when hours or minutes change

b-timepicker/editable.description: Enable input/typing. Note that you might have to set a custom time parser

b-timepicker/hour-format.description: Hour format for input and display

b-timepicker/inline.description: Timepicker is shown inline, input is removed

b-timepicker/loading.description: Add the loading state to the input

b-timepicker/position.description: Optional, position of the timepicker relative to the input

b-timepicker/size.description: Vertical size of input and picker, optional

b-timepicker/time-creator.description: Function used internally to create a new Date instance

b-timepicker/time-formatter.description: Function to format time (Date type) to a string for display in the input

b-timepicker/time-parser.description: Function to parse string to a time (Date type) for set a time from the input to the component

b-tooltip/active.description: Whether tooltip is active or not

b-tooltip/animated.description: Tooltip will have a little fade animation

b-tooltip/dashed.description: Tooltip slot will have a dashed underline

b-tooltip/delay.description: Tooltip delay before it appears (number in ms)

b-tooltip/position.description: Tooltip position in relation to the element

b-tooltip/size.description: Tooltip multiline size (only works for multilined tooltips)

b-tooltip/square.description: Tooltip will be square (not rounded corners)

b-upload/drag-drop.description: Accepts drag & drop and change its style

b-upload/multiple.description: Same as native, also push new item to v-model instead of replacing

b-upload/native.description: Replace last chosen files every time (like native file input element)

b-upload/type.description: Type (color) of the drag area when hovered
